column1: ├─ app/                          # app-wide wiring (bootstrap, routing, theme, DI)
│  │  ├─ app_bootstrap.dart      # Starts the app, ProviderScope, injects global overrides (e.g., mock clients in dev/tests)., error hooks
│  │  ├─ hive_init.dart          # open boxes, register adapters,Central place to add/remove boxes safely
│  │  └─ env_loader.dart         #Loads .env or compile-time constants; detects flavor (dev/stg/prod), Validates required vars (base URLs, feature flags) and logs a friendly error if missing.
│  │  ├─ env.dart                # A tiny model for current environment and accessors (e.g., Env.current.apiBaseUrl).
│  │  ├─ constants.dart          # Global constants that aren’t styles: API timeouts, pagination defaults, debounce durations, keys for shared prefs, etc.
│  │  └─ feature_flags.dart      # Central switches for staged rollouts/experiments; used in providers & UI to gate features.
│  │  ├─ app_router.dart         # GoRouter/Navigator 2.0 setup, Declares typed paths, route params, transitions, and deep links, Encapsulates navigation helpers (e.g., goToLogin(), goToHome()).
│  │  └─ guards/                 # This folder contains small files that protect certain routes (screens) in your app, guards decide whether a user is allowed to enter a screen or not.

│  │  │  └─ adapters/            # When you want to save a custom Dart object (like User, Profile, or Pooja) into Hive, Hive doesn’t understand your object directly — it only understands basic types (String, int, etc.).
├─ features/                     # each feature is isolated & complete
│  │  ├─ domain/                 # defines what a User and Session are, and an abstract AuthRepository.
│  │  │  ├─ states/              # AuthState, SessionState, what the login state is (loading, success, error).
│  │  │  └─ usecases/            # login, logout, refreshToken,actual functions for login, logout, refresh.
│  │  │  │  ├─ remote/           # auth_api.dart, API calls to backend
│  │  │  └─ repositories/        # joins both remote + local logic (AuthRepositoryImpl).
│  │     └─ components/          # header_section, form_section, actions_section,smaller parts (header, form, buttons).
